title: Singapore Urban Escape

itinerary.title: Arrival & Marina Bay
itinerary.description: Arrive in Singapore, check-in and explore Marina Bay Sands and Gardens by the Bay.

itinerary.title: Sentosa Island
itinerary.description: Full day at Sentosa Island with Universal Studios or beach activities.

itinerary.title: City Tour & Shopping
itinerary.description: Visit Orchard Road, Little India, and Chinatown. Evening at Clarke Quay.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Last minute shopping and transfer to airport.

description: Experience the perfect blend of modern architecture, diverse culture, and world-class attractions in Singapore.
